sentences.sentence: Genuineness and uniqueness of drawings really attract and fascinate.
sentences.translation: 绘图作品的真诚与独特着实令人神往。

sentences.sentence: More patches of bright red azaleas which, I feel the genuineness of the coming of spring!
sentences.translation: 更有那一片片鲜红的杜鹃花，让我真真切切地感受到春天的来临！

sentences.sentence: Her level of courage and genuineness inspires me daily. She pushes me as a writer and an artist.
sentences.translation: 我的妻子- - -她的勇气和真诚每天都激励着我，是她使我成为一个作家和艺术家。
